Package com.samsung.android.sdk.cup

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ScupButton.ClickListener
    This listener interface is called when user click button.
    ScupDatePicker.DateChangeListener
    This listener interface is called when date is changed.
    ScupDialog.ActionButtonClickListener
    This listener interface is called when user click the system button.
    ScupDialog.BackPressedListener
    This listener interface is called when user click the back button in the dialog
    ScupDialog.CaptureListener
    This listener interface is called when captured image download is completed
    ScupDialog.GestureListener
    This listener interface is called when user flicks or taps on the screen.
    ScupDialog.TitleButtonClickListener
    This listener interface is called when user click the system button.
    ScupLabel.TapListener
    This listener interface is called when user taps on the screen.
    ScupListBox.ItemClickListener
    This listener interface is called when user click ListBox
    ScupMediaController.ClickListener
    This listener interface is called when user click button.
    ScupSlider.ChangeListener
    The Slider listener information.
    ScupSpinner.ChangeListener
    The spinner item changed listener.
    ScupSpinner.ClickListener
    The spinner item click listener.
    ScupThumbnailListBox.ClickListener
    This listener interface is called when user click ScupThumbnailListBox item.
    ScupTimePicker.TimeChangeListener
    This listener interface is called when time is changed.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Scup
    This class represents the cup package and provides the version number, version name, feature checking and initialization methods.
    ScupButton
    This class represents a button widget.
    ScupDatePicker
    This class represents a date widget for selecting a date.
    ScupDevice
    This class provides methods for managing the short-cut icon of this application at the device.
    ScupDevice.ConnectionListener
    listener to notify changes on device
    ScupDialog
    This class represents a Dialog
    ScupGraph
    This class represents a graph widget.
    ScupLabel
    This class represents a label widget.
    ScupListBox
    This class represents a listbox.
    ScupMediaController
    CUP Media Controller widget.
    ScupProgressBar
    This class represents a progress bar.
    ScupSeparator
    This class represents a separator.
    ScupSlider
    This class represents a slider widget.
    ScupSpinner
    This class represents a spinner.
    ScupTextClock
    This class represents a text clock.
    ScupThumbnailListBox
    This class represents a ScupThumbnailListBox widget.
    ScupTimePicker
    This class represents a TimePicker.
    ScupWidgetBase
    This class represents a WidgetBase.
